Published October 26 2014

5G

5G — Re/Code: Plans for 5G cellular service are already underway. What I find remarkable is twofold: 1.) within a half decade, 10 gigabits per second cellular data will be here; and 2.) we’re already referring to the current spectrum as “traditional 4G frequencies.”

Enjoy your day.
